texts.name: Tarnum
texts.biography: Judged by the Ancestors as unworthy of entering Paradise, Tarnum wanders the land seeking redemption for the crimes of his past. He's the Immortal Hero, a timeless protector, but personally troubled by the doubt that he can ever make up for the tremendous wrongs he performed in his youth.

specialty.description:
{Basilisks and Greater Basilisks}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Basilisks and Greater Basilisks for each level attained after 4th level. Additionally, Basilisks and Greater Basilisks get a permanent +1 Speed bonus.
specialty.name: Basilisks
